title: 'Happy with the product'
body: I'm using this product for so long and happy with this set. Value for money. Good material. Knives are must have in kitchen.

title: 'Great product!'
body: 'This is the second such set I have bought although the first from Amazon. My first set stood up to two decades of heavy use. So there was no question in my mind about the product. It was delivered early and in pristine condition. Cuts beautifully right out of the box. I especially love the big knife. Although my wife prefers the little one. The tomato knife is delightful. The fruit forks are good when we use them ... mostly we just use our fingers! A great buy ... easily recommended!'
